snippet: Republicans are asking voters to oust three justices and give the legislature more power over the court.
abstract: Republicans, in a bid to remake Florida's judiciary, are asking voters to oust three state Supreme Court justices and give the Legislature more power over Supreme Court appointments and judicial rules of procedure.
lead_paragraph: Republicans are asking voters to oust three justices and give the legislature more power over the court.

headline.seo: Republican Party Aims to Remake Florida Supreme Court
headline.main: G.O.P. Aims to Remake Florida Supreme Court
headline.print_headline: G.O.P. Aims to Remake Florida Supreme Court

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
